articles.author: Hannah Getahun, Lloyd Lee
articles.title: DEI exec at Uber placed on leave after 'Karen' event - Business Insider
articles.description: Uber's head of diversity hosted an event that focused on the "spectrum of the American white woman's experience" and the term "Karen."
articles.content:
A DEI executive at Uber who upset employees by hosting an event that highlighted the "spectrum of the American white woman's experience" has been put on leave, according to reports. 
In a statement … [+1142 chars]

articles.title: Watch American Idol Season 21 Winner Iam Tongi Duet With James Blunt - Vulture
articles.description: Iam Tongi won season 21 of American Idol. He went viral for covering James Blunt’s “Monsters” in his audition, and reprised the song in the finale.
articles.content:
Iam Tongi won season 21 of American Idol Sunday night, with the 18-year-old beating out runners-up Megan Danielle and Colin Stough.

articles.title: NAACP issues travel advisory for Florida, saying the state 'devalues and marginalizes' African Americans - WESH 2 Orlando
articles.description: The NAACP over the weekend issued a travel advisory for Florida, joining two other civil rights groups in warning potential tourists.
